name: HoustonGuide
0:
”Alexa, Open Houston Guide and tell me a good attraction”
”Alexa, Open Houston Guide and tell me the top five things”
”Alexa, Open Houston Guide and tell me the local news”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: houston guide
des:
If you are visiting Houston and need an idea of where to visit, enable the Houston Guide skill in Alexa to get the top attractions to visit, top five things to do in houston, and even the local Houston news.

To use the Houston Guide just say "Alexa, Open Houston Guide," and proceed to ask for an attraction. With in no time you will get information about the attraction including the location and contact information. All that is left is to simply have a good time in Houston.
